channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Young Tree Requires maintenance, 1st December
item.description:
Tree outside of 22 Nightingale Road. Pulled out of ground and supports snapped.

item.title: Graffiti on the public path at the rear of Dunstonian Court, 1st December
item.description:
Graffiti on the public path at the rear of Dunstonian Court, this includes highly offensive words which need cleaning. The foot path is used by people traversing the railway whilst the bridge over the platforms a t the station are closed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 213, Petts Wood Road, Poverest, Orpington, Greater London

item.title: Fly tipping near residential bins., 1st December
item.description:

item.title: Request for Cleaning of Leaves on Pavement (House No. 53–35), 1st December
item.description:
Dear Hackney Council Team, I hope you are well. I would like to report a build-up of leaves on the pavement along [Street Name], specifically on the side of the road from house number 35 to house number 53. The issue has been present for approximately

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Dunlace Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Permanently parked van on corner, 1st December
item.description:
Permanently parked yellow van on corner of Tangltree Close and Briarfield Avenue obstruction view for drivers trying to navigate the corner. Have witnessed a couple of near misses where school children have been crossing the road but are concealed from oncoming traffic on Tangletree Close turning into briarfield avenue. Only a matter of time before someone gets knocked over or cars collide because they can’t see each other. This has been the situation for 3-4 months now.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 63-77, Briarfield Avenue, Finchley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Accumulated leaf fall, 1st December
item.description:
Excessive leaf fall is now decaying becoming slippery and presenting a trip/slip hazard to pedestrians. Drains are blocked leading to localised flooding during periods of rainfall.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 27,25,23,21,19,17,15,13,11,9, Briarfield Avenue, Finchley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Halstead Road, North End, Greater London

item.title: Outside 38 Earlham Street, 1st December
item.description:
